answers.author: Katharine Greenlee
answers.text:
Scott, 
I believe you are looking for ICMA-RC which handles retirement accounts. ICMA and ICMA-RC are separate organizations. You can visit their website at ww.icmarc.org or call 1-800-669-7400.
Katharine Greenlee
Community Engagement Manager, Knowledge Network
kgreenlee@icma.org
